titleInfo.title: Circular no.3391 of 1855, from W. Hart, Secretary to Government, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The printed circular includes a copy of a letter from the Secretary to the Government of India, dated 21 September 1855, with a request that annual reports are submitted punctually each year at the end of May, direct to Government. The letter continues with instructions as to how reports should be set out and arranged, with a list of headings and subheadings specified.
